General.Name: Sinochem International Corp
General.Description: Sinochem International Corporation engages in the intermediates, new materials, polymer additives, and natural rubber businesses worldwide. The company offers pesticide intermediates, electronic chemicals, and pharmaceutical intermediates; and ultraviolet absorbent, light stabilizers, polymerization inhibitors, and antioxidants. It offers epoxy resin, including fibers, membrane, and lightweight materials. In addition, the company provides lithium batteries and materials. Further, it engages in the research, production, and sale of pharmaceuticals, healthcare, and medical device-related products. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Sinochem International Corporation is a subsidiary of Sinochem Holdings.
